A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Sad to say this but this was the biggest let down EVER. In other words\, its time for the Jedi and Star Wars to end. What you expected to happen doesnt happen. The writers portrayed Luke as an arrogant jerk\, focused too much on secondary characters. By far the worst of the saga and sad to say this but I wont be seeing Star Wars ep. 9. Disney ruined my favourite movie franchise and everyone will remember this moment.
